definition: (of weather) free from storm or wind, steadiness of mind under stress, to cause to be calm or quiet as by administering a sedative to
details:
adjective
- (of weather) free from storm or wind
= example: (of weather) free from storm or wind
- not agitated
= synonyms: unagitated
noun
- steadiness of mind under stress
= synonyms: composure, calmness, equanimity
- wind moving at less than 1 knot
= synonyms: calm air
verb
- to cause to be calm or quiet as by administering a sedative to
= example: to cause to be calm or quiet as by administering a sedative to
= synonyms: sedate, tranquillise, tranquilise, tranquilize, tranquillize
- to make steady
= synonyms: steady
- to become quiet or calm, especially after a state of agitation
= synonyms: cool off, settle down, calm down, chill out, simmer down, cool it
- to make calm or still
= synonyms: quiet
